message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we meet somewhere in between?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its value.  To make this work, I can offer it to you for $18,000.  This is a very competitive price for such a high-quality product.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I cannot exceed my budget. I would like to stick to my original offer of $12,000 if possible. I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
